ygData.subject: Re: Level 17 Dual Wield - need good weps
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Scimitars are fast, rapiers too. ... Sneak seems to effect the radius at which mobs notice you, or more likely just lets you come up behind them without
ygData.messageBody:
>From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>So what should I get? My piercing skill is prolly higher than my 1hs. So I
>was thinking a combine dagger. Or a whip (kewl dood sound effects <g>)


Scimitars are fast, rapiers too.
>
>p.s. I also got sneak! how does that work? makes you kinda invisible? or
>changes attitude of monster? someone said you can play songs and sneak -
>what about run? can you run and sneak?


Sneak seems to effect the radius at which mobs notice you, or more likely
just lets you come up behind them without them seeing you (rogues use it for
backstabbing). My rogue friend, however, told me that it now functions
similar to invisibility on the test server. Use the skill a few levels
there, until it becomes obsolete by a song.

Roop
